resp = client.search(
    query={
        "terms": {
            "force": [
                "British Transport Police"
            ]
        }
    },
    aggregations={
        "significant_crime_types": {
            "significant_terms": {
                "field": "crime_type"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
